title: Bob Marley & Jesus Christ
subtitle_html: Why Bob Marley Is My Personal Jesus
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html: These images show that Bob Marley and Jesus Christ have similar personalities. The colors in these images illustrate the Jungian archetypes that form the basis of the four-letter types popularized by the MBTI®. The Blue in these spiritual portraits show that both of them tend to be idealistic in general — and spiritual in particular. The Red represents their tendency to be emotional in general — and people-oriented in particular.
card_first_person_html:
Based on my analysis, Bob Marley is an ENFP and Jesus is an INFJ. As an INFP, my personality is a blend of theirs.

While some religious people make good role models, there are plenty who do not. Unfortunately — as is typical in many facets of life — it is the bad actors rather than the good who seem to garner the most attention.

Maybe you can relate to my story? Perhaps you've had similar experiences in your quest to understand the answer to life, the universe, and everything?

In sharing this story I seek to encourage you to find your own path — your own Personal Jesus. When it comes to religion, after centuries of senseless suffering and murder, if one thing should be clear to all of us it is that one size most definitely does not fit all!
